description: You can not only follow the adventures of Master Chief but also see things from the prespective of Thel Vadam, while you were busy fighting the covanant. You can also play as Spartan May and find out what the hell is going on with the mysterious planet that your ship landed on
About 18 new types of enemy characters. They are also much more challenging to fight. The covenant have been busy recruiting and every type of character can be infected by flood
But fear not because you have a lot of new vehicles to destroy the covenant even faster

SPV3 has the biggest sandbox of any Halo game for the time, with over 45 new weapons, 18 new enemies, and triple the number of vehicles. Plus there are 15 skulls so you can make every playthrough unique
There's a ton of post processing effects that bring the 2001 game to modern day standards. There is better lighting, ambient dynamic shadows, path traced reflections, better HDR and lot more
SPV3 is a huge culmination of Custom Edition community content with over two decades of development time. It's a celebration of creativity of the Halo modding community
